history.proof: intros n m p H. strivial use: N.add_le_mono_l.

exceptions.tactic: apply (N.le_add_le_sub_l p (N.add p n) (N.add p m)).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : p + n <= p + m Unable to unify "p + m <= p + n - p" with "n <= m".
Found no subterm matching "?M1837 + ?M1838 - ?M1839" in the current goal.
In environment n, m, p : N H : p + n <= p + m Unable to unify "p + n <= p + m" with "n <= m".

original: intros n m p H. apply (N.le_add_le_sub_l p (N.add p n) (N.add p m)). rewrite N.add_sub_swap, N.add_sub_assoc. apply H.
